name: Bobby The Cat
description: Bobby The Cat ($BTc) is a cryptocurrency project built on the Solana network that combines the cultural power of meme coins with a concrete and measurable social mission. It is a technology-driven social initiative designed to deliver direct impact to communities by integrating decentralized finance (DeFi), a blockchain project aggregation platform, and a digital collectibles (NFT) ecosystem. The project is structured around three core pillars: 1. Charity: A program that funds education initiatives, nutritious meal support (in line with Indonesia's MBG program), social assistance, and animal welfare. 2. Blockchain Aggregator (BobbyLaB): A live utility that provides consultation, incubation, and a toolkit for Web3 projects in Indonesia. 3. NFT Collections: An ecosystem created to recognize and reward domestic artists and serve as a means of community engagement.
